channel.title: Projects on Virtual Sachin
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Virtual Sachin

item.title: Project Sentinel: AI Infrastructure Anomaly Detection
item.description: Using Prometheus metrics and Unsupervised Learning to predict outages before they happen.

item.title: Project Nebula: Serverless Event Bus
item.description: A multi-region serverless event bus capable of handling 50M+ events per day with <200ms E2E latency.

item.title: Project Titan: Monolith to Microservices
item.description: Strangler Fig migration of a 10-year-old Java monolith to a federated Go microservices mesh.
